body:
Hello People

Just informing my um ban has been uplifted. I found my issue with Minecraft and that was I can't login through the server and going to Hub as I do crash. So I was emailed by Nolan that I should try Direct connecting and it works.

If you wanna spend time with me then um go ahead and ask. (If I have time of course) :S

replies.body: How do u make a forum xD
replies.body_tagged: How do u make a forum xD

replies.body:
Go to the topic you want to discuss on, and just hit "new discussion" at the top right.

Welcome to the forums, Biza :D
